prompt.initial_prompt:
You will play a game with {n_rounds} rounds. In each round you will choose A.
You will be prompted like this: "You choose: ". Answer like this: "A"
prompt.feedback_prompt: Trial {current_trial}, Round {current_round}: You chose "{current_answer}" and saw {result_text}.
prompt.final_feedback: Trial {current_trial}, Round {current_round}: You chose "{current_answer}" and saw {result_text}. {reward_text}
